verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2064><s%> His Having Gone <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Of One <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> On A Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Bread, <S%G740><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Watching <S%G3906><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> Dropsical <S%G5203><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doctors Of The Law <S%G3544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> , <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G1487><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> To Heal? <S%G2323><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Silent. <S%G2270><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Taking Hold Of Him <S%G1949><s%> He Healed <S%G2390><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Him Go. <S%G630><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Of Which <S%G5101><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> An Ass <S%G3688><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> An Ox <S%G1016><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Pit <S%G5421><s%> , Shall Fall, <S%G1706><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> He Will Pull Up <S%G385><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath? <S%G4521><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Were Not Able <S%G2480><s%> To Reply <S%G470><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> As To <S%G4314><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Were Invited <S%G2564><s%> A Parable, <S%G3850><s%> Remarking <S%G1907><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First Places <S%G4411><s%> They Were Choosing Out, <S%G1586><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Art Invited <S%G2564><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1062><s%> Wedding Feasts, <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Recline <S%G2625><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First Place, <S%G4411><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> A More Honourable Than <S%G1784><s%> <S%G4675><s%> Thou <S%G5600><s%> May Have Been Invited <S%G2564><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Invited <S%G2564><s%> Shall Say <S%G2046><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To This One <S%G5129><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Thou Begin <S%G756><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Shame <S%G152><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> To Take. <S%G2722><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Art Invited, <S%G2564><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Recline <S%G377><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He May Come <S%G2064><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Has Invited <S%G2564><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> He May Say <S%G2036><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Friend, <S%G5384><s%> Come Up <S%G4320><s%> Higher. <S%G511><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Recline At Table With <S%G4873><s%> Thee; <S%G4671><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Exalts <S%G5312><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Humbled, <S%G5013><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Humbles <S%G5013><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Invited <S%G2564><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Makest <S%G4160><s%> A Dinner <S%G712><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G1173><s%> A Supper, <S%G3361><s%> Call Not <S%G5455><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5384><s%> Thy Friends <S%G4675><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4773><s%> Thy Kinsfolk <S%G4675><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Neighbours <S%G1069><s%> Rich, <S%G4145><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Should Invite In Return, <S%G479><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Made <S%G1096><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> A Recompense; <S%G468><s%>
' But <S%G235><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Makest <S%G4160><s%> A Feast, <S%G1403><s%> Call <S%G2564><s%> Poor, <S%G4434><s%> , Crippled, <S%G376><s%> Lame, <S%G5560><s%> Blind; <S%G5185><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Thou Shalt Be; <S%G2071><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Have Not Wherewith <S%G2192><s%> To Recompense <S%G467><s%> Thee; <S%G4671><s%> It Shall Be Recompensed <S%G467><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Just. <S%G1342><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Reclining At Table With Him <S%G4873><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Blessed He <S%G3107><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Eat <S%G5315><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> A Supper <S%G1173><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Invited <S%G2564><s%> Many. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondman <S%G846><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> To Say <S%G2036><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Invited, <S%G2564><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Now <S%G2235><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> With <S%G575><s%> One Consent <S%G1520><s%> To Excuse Themselves <S%G3868><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> A Field <S%G68><s%> I Have Bought, <S%G59><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> Need <S%G318><s%> To Go Out <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> I Pray <S%G2065><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Hold <S%G2192><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Excused. <S%G3868><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Pairs <S%G2201><s%> Of Oxen <S%G1016><s%> I Have Bought <S%G59><s%> Five, <S%G4002><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Go <S%G4198><s%> To Prove <S%G1381><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> I Pray <S%G2065><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Hold <S%G2192><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Excused. <S%G3868><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> A Wife <S%G1135><s%> I Have Married, <S%G1060><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Unable <S%G1410><s%> To Come. <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G3854><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> That Bondman <S%G1565><s%> Reported <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> To His Lord <S%G846><s%> These Things. <S%G5023><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Being Angry <S%G3710><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The House <S%G3617><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To His Bondman, <S%G846><s%> Go Out <S%G1831><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Streets <S%G4113><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lanes <S%G4505><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Crippled <S%G376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> Bring In <S%G1521><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> It Has Been Done <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thou Didst Command, <S%G2004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> Room <S%G5117><s%> There Is. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> Go Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ways <S%G3598><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hedges, <S%G5418><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Compel <S%G315><s%> To Come In, <S%G1525><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Be Filled <S%G1072><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> My House; <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not One <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G435><s%> Of Those Men <S%G1565><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Invited <S%G2564><s%> Shall Taste <S%G1089><s%> Of My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Supper. <S%G1173><s%>

<S%G4848><s%> And Were Going With <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great; <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Turned <S%G4762><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Carries Not <S%G941><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Cannot <S%G1410><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Be <S%G1511><s%> Disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For Which <S%G1063><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Desiring <S%G2309><s%> A Tower <S%G4444><s%> To Build, <S%G3618><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Having Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> Counts <S%G5585><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cost, <S%G1160><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> The Means <S%G3588><s%> For Its <S%G4314><s%> Completion? <S%G535><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Having Laid <S%G5087><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> A Foundation <S%G2310><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Being Able <S%G2480><s%> To Finish, <S%G1615><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> See It <S%G2334><s%> Should Begin <S%G756><s%> To Mock At <S%G1702><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Build, <S%G3618><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Able <S%G2480><s%> To Finish. <S%G1615><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Proceeding <S%G4198><s%> To Engage <S%G4820><s%> With Another <S%G2087><s%> King <S%G935><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> War <S%G4171><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> Having Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Takes Counsel <S%G1011><s%> Whether <S%G1487><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> To Meet <S%G528><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Twenty <S%G1501><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Who Comes <S%G2064><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> , Not, <S%G3361><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Far Off <S%G4206><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> An Embassy <S%G4242><s%> Having Sent <S%G649><s%> He Asks <S%G2065><s%> The Terms <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Peace. <S%G1515><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Does Take Leave Of <S%G657><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> He Himself <S%G1438><s%> Possesses, <S%G5224><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Cannot <S%G1410><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Be <S%G1511><s%> Disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

Good Is <S%G2570><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salt, <S%G217><s%> <S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salt <S%G217><s%> Become Tasteless <S%G3471><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall It Be Seasoned? <S%G741><s%>

Neither <S%G3777><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Manure <S%G2874><s%> Fit <S%G2111><s%> Is It : <S%G2076><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> They Cast <S%G906><s%> It. <S%G846><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>
